root.name: Puyo Puyo!! Quest
root.description: OverviewPuyo Puyo!! Quest is a free to play spinoff of Sega's Puyo Puyo series that adapts the franchise's puzzle gameplay into a Puzzle Dragons-like RPG. The game was released for iOS on April 24, 2013; additionally, there will be an arcade release that does not charge the player until a certain amount of time passes.
